name: Imperial Ward
desc:
Reduces all damage taken by 25%, unless hit with an elemental combo, then unit takes 50% more damage for 1 turn.
Combos (<icon>Wind</> after <icon>Fire</>, <icon>Thunder</> after <icon>Water</>, <icon>LightA</> after <icon>DarkA</>, <red>Heavy</> after <icon>Ice</>)
Reduces all damage taken by 75% and increases Avoid by 75 when attacked from more than 4 tiles away.
